channel.title: Rmarkdown on Dental Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Rmarkdown on Dental Data Science

item.title: Post in rmarkdown
item.author: sergio.uribe@gmail.com (Sergio Uribe)
item.description: Exploratory data analysis of medical data library(pubh)## Loading required package: lattice## Loading required package: latticeExtra## Loading required package: RColorBrewerlibrary(tidyverse)## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ──## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0## ── Conflicts ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ## ✖ ggplot2::layer() masks latticeExtra::layer() Dataset data(Hodgkin) Exploring the raw dataset head(Hodgkin)## CD4 CD8 Group ## 1 396 836 Hodgkin ## 2 568 978 Hodgkin ## 3 1212 1678 Hodgkin ## 4 171 212 Hodgkin ## 5 554 670 Hodgkin ## 6 1104 1335 Hodgkin Summary tables Hodgkin %>% gather(key = "Cell", value = value, CD4:CD8) %>% group_by(Group, Cell) %>% summarise(Mean = mean(value)) %>% spread(Cell, Mean)## # A tibble: 2 x 3 ## # Groups: Group [2] ## Group CD4 CD8 ## * <fct> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 Non-Hodgkin 522 260 ## 2 Hodgkin 823 614 Visualizations Histogram Hodgkin %>% mutate("CD4/CD8 ratio" = CD4 / CD8) %>% ggplot(aes(x = `CD4/CD8 ratio`, fill = Group)) + geom_histogram(bins = 9, alpha = 0.

item.title: Post in rmarkdown
item.author: sergio.uribe@gmail.com (Sergio Uribe)
item.description: Exploratory data analysis of medical data library(pubh)## Loading required package: lattice## Loading required package: latticeExtra## Loading required package: RColorBrewerlibrary(tidyverse)## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ──## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0## ── Conflicts ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ## ✖ ggplot2::layer() masks latticeExtra::layer() Dataset data(Hodgkin) Exploring the raw dataset head(Hodgkin)## CD4 CD8 Group ## 1 396 836 Hodgkin ## 2 568 978 Hodgkin ## 3 1212 1678 Hodgkin ## 4 171 212 Hodgkin ## 5 554 670 Hodgkin ## 6 1104 1335 Hodgkin Summary tables Hodgkin %>% gather(key = "Cell", value = value, CD4:CD8) %>% group_by(Group, Cell) %>% summarise(Mean = mean(value)) %>% spread(Cell, Mean)## # A tibble: 2 x 3 ## # Groups: Group [2] ## Group CD4 CD8 ## * <fct> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 Non-Hodgkin 522 260 ## 2 Hodgkin 823 614 Visualizations Histogram Hodgkin %>% mutate("CD4/CD8 ratio" = CD4 / CD8) %>% ggplot(aes(x = `CD4/CD8 ratio`, fill = Group)) + geom_histogram(bins = 9, alpha = 0.
